verses.text: \w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*, “\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* chosen, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w inexperienced|strong="H7390"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w task|strong="H4399"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w palace|strong="H1002"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Toward \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* 5,000 \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \f + \fr 29:7 \ft 5,000 talents is approximately 188.5 tons or 171 metric tons of gold.\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 10,000 darics \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*,\f + \fr 29:7 \ft Or 10,000 gold drachmas; that is, approximately 185.2 pounds or 84 kilograms of gold coins\f* 10,000 \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*,\f + \fr 29:7 \ft 10,000 talents is approximately 377 tons or 342 metric tons of silver.\f* 18,000 \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*,\f + \fr 29:7 \ft 18,000 talents is approximately 678.6 tons or 615.6 metric tons of bronze.\f* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 100,000 \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.\f + \fr 29:7 \ft 100,000 talents is approximately 3,770 tons or 3,420 metric tons of iron.\f*

Whoever \w had|strong="H3068"\w* precious stones \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w treasury|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w care|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w* \f + \fr 29:8 \ft Jehiel is a variant of Jehieli; see 1 Chronicles 26:21.\f* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w willing|strong="H5068"\w* response \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H8055"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w freely|strong="H5068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wholeheartedly. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w greatly|strong="H1419"\w*. David’s Prayer of Blessing

\w Then|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said: “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* father \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*.

Yours, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w power|strong="H1369"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w splendor|strong="H1935"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w majesty|strong="H1935"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*. Yours, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w exalted|strong="H4984"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w over|strong="H7218"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Both|strong="H3605"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w honor|strong="H3519"\w* come \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*. \w In|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w might|strong="H1369"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w exalt|strong="H1431"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* give \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, our God, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w You|strong="H3034"\w* \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3034"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w Your|strong="H3034"\w* \w glorious|strong="H8597"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w generously|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w comes|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1616"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* forefathers. \w Our|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*, \w without|strong="H3588"\w* \w hope|strong="H4723"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* comes \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w abundance|strong="H1995"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w provided|strong="H3559"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* test \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w delight|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w given|strong="H5068"\w* \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w upright|strong="H4339"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w present|strong="H4672"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* giving \w joyfully|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w* \w to|strong="H3824"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers Abraham, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w desire|strong="H3824"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w intentions|strong="H4284"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w direct|strong="H3559"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w toward|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w carry|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, decrees, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1002"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w which|strong="H1002"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w provision|strong="H3559"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*, “\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.” \w So|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w paid|strong="H7812"\w* \w homage|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.
